SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_NAMEFORMAT_HOUSEHOLD_ADDRESSEE_FORMAL
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_NAMEFORMAT_HOUSEHOLD_ADDRESSEE_FORMAL ( @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier, @LASTNAME nvarchar(100), @FIRSTNAME nvarchar(50), @MIDDLENAME nvarchar(50), @TITLE nvarchar(100), @SUFFIX nvarchar(100), @SPOUSELASTNAME nvarchar(100), @SPOUSEFIRSTNAME nvarchar(50), @SPOUSEMIDDLENAME nvarchar(50), @SPOUSETITLE nvarchar(100), @SPOUSESUFFIX nvarchar(100) ) returns nvarchar(700) with execute as caller as begin declare @RESULT nvarchar(700); set @result = '' declare @spouseid uniqueidentifier; SET @spouseid = null; SELECT @spouseid = dbo.USR_GETSPOUSEID(@CONSTITUENTID);
-- Unmarried if @spouseid is null begin SELECT @result = dbo.USR_UFN_INDIVIDUAL_ADDRESSEE_FORMAL( @CONSTITUENTID , @LASTNAME , @FIRSTNAME , @MIDDLENAME , @TITLE , @SUFFIX , @SPOUSELASTNAME , @SPOUSEFIRSTNAME , @SPOUSEMIDDLENAME , @SPOUSETITLE , @SPOUSESUFFIX );
return @result; end
-- Married if @spouseid is not null begin
-- Find out the gender and how special their title is in order to address them properly declare @gender int; declare @spousegender int; declare @spechandle bit; declare @spousespechandle bit; declare @spousefirst bit; declare @usespousename bit; declare @usetitles bit; declare @usefirstnames bit; declare @difflastnames bit; declare @usespousesuff bit; declare @usesuff bit; declare @usemiddle bit; declare @usealphabetical bit; declare @conisprim bit; declare @spisprim bit; declare @titleguid uniqueidentifier; declare @spousetitleguid uniqueidentifier; declare @suffixguid uniqueidentifier; declare @spousesuffixguid uniqueidentifier;
SET @gender = null; SET @spousegender = null; SET @spechandle = null; SET @spousespechandle = null; SET @spousefirst = null; SET @usespousename = null; SET @usetitles = null; SET @usefirstnames = null; SET @difflastnames = null; SET @usespousesuff = null; SET @usesuff = null; SET @usemiddle = null; SET @usealphabetical = null; SET @conisprim = null; SET @spisprim = null; SET @titleguid = null; SET @spousetitleguid = null; SET @suffixguid = null; SET @spousesuffixguid = null;
SELECT @gender = dbo.USR_UFN_GETGENDER(@CONSTITUENTID); SELECT @spousegender = dbo.USR_UFN_GETGENDER(@spouseid); SELECT @spechandle = CASE dbo.USR_UFN_ISMARITALTITLE(@CONSTITUENTID) WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END; SELECT @spousespechandle = CASE dbo.USR_UFN_ISMARITALTITLE(@spouseid) WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END; SELECT @conisprim = dbo.USR_UFN_ISPRIMARYHOUSEHOLDMEMBER(@CONSTITUENTID) SELECT @spisprim = dbo.USR_UFN_ISPRIMARYHOUSEHOLDMEMBER(@spouseid) SELECT @titleguid = dbo.USR_UFN_GETTITLEGUID(@TITLE) SELECT @spousetitleguid = dbo.USR_UFN_GETTITLEGUID(@SPOUSETITLE) SELECT @suffixguid = dbo.USR_UFN_GETSUFFIXGUID(@SUFFIX) SELECT @spousesuffixguid = dbo.USR_UFN_GETSUFFIXGUID(@SPOUSESUFFIX)
if @gender = 0 AND @TITLEGUID IS NOT NULL begin SET @gender = dbo.USR_UFN_GETTITLEGENDER(@TITLEGUID)
end
if @spousegender = 0 AND @SPOUSETITLEGUID IS NOT NULL begin SET @spousegender = dbo.USR_UFN_GETTITLEGENDER(@SPOUSETITLEGUID) end
if LOWER(@LASTNAME) <> LOWER(@SPOUSELASTNAME) SET @difflastnames = 1; else SET @difflastnames = 0;
-- Only use items in pairs
if len(isnull(@title, '')) = 0 OR len(isnull(@SPOUSETITLE, '')) = 0 set @usetitles = 0 else set @usetitles = 1
if len(@firstname) = 0 OR len(@spousefirstname) = 0 set @usefirstnames = 0 else set @usefirstnames = 1
if len(@middlename) = 0 OR len(@spousemiddlename) = 0 OR @usefirstnames = 0 set @usemiddle = 0 else set @usemiddle = 0
-- Do we use suffixes if (len(isnull(@SUFFIX, '')) > 0 AND dbo.USR_UFN_ISFAMILIALSUFFIX(@suffixguid) = 1 AND @usefirstnames = 1) OR (len(isnull(@SUFFIX, '')) > 0 AND dbo.USR_UFN_ISRELIGIOUSSUFFIX(@SUFFIXGUID) = 1) SET @USESUFF = 1 if (len(isnull(@SPOUSESUFFIX, '')) > 0 AND dbo.USR_UFN_ISFAMILIALSUFFIX(@spousesuffixguid) = 1 AND @usefirstnames = 1) OR (len(isnull(@SPOUSESUFFIX, '')) > 0 AND dbo.USR_UFN_ISRELIGIOUSSUFFIX(@SPOUSESUFFIXGUID) = 1) SET @USESPOUSESUFF = 1 if @usesuff is null SET @usesuff = 0 if @usespousesuff is null set @usespousesuff = 0
-- No first names and no titles, this is the fallback Johnson and Smith Household if @usefirstnames = 0 AND @usetitles = 0 begin if LOWER(@LASTNAME) <> LOWER(@SPOUSELASTNAME) begin return dbo.USR_UFN_SORTNAME(@LASTNAME, @SPOUSELASTNAME, 0) + N' and ' + dbo.USR_UFN_SORTNAME(@LASTNAME, @SPOUSELASTNAME, 1) + N' Household'; end ELSE begin return @LASTNAME + N' Household'; end end
-- Pick the ordering of the name format IF @spechandle = 1 AND @spousespechandle = 0 AND @usetitles = 1 begin SET @spousefirst = 0 set @usealphabetical = 0 end IF @spechandle = 0 AND @spousespechandle = 1 AND @usetitles = 1 and @spousefirst is null begin SET @spousefirst = 1 set @usealphabetical = 0 end if @spousegender = 2 AND @gender = 1 and @spousefirst is null begin set @spousefirst = 0; set @usealphabetical = 0; end if @spousegender = 1 AND @gender = 2 and @spousefirst is null begin set @spousefirst = 1; set @usealphabetical = 0; end if (@spousegender = @gender ) and @spousefirst is null and @spisprim = 1 and @conisprim = 0 begin set @usealphabetical = 0 set @spousefirst = 1 end if (@spousegender = @gender ) and @spousefirst is null and @spisprim = 0 and @conisprim = 1 begin set @usealphabetical = 0 set @spousefirst = 0 end if (@spousegender = @gender ) and @spousefirst is null begin set @usealphabetical = 1 set @spousefirst = null end if dbo.USR_UFN_ISRELIGIOUSTITLE(@TITLEGUID) = 1 or dbo.USR_UFN_ISRELIGIOUSTITLE(@SPOUSETITLEGUID) = 1 begin if dbo.USR_UFN_ISRELIGIOUSTITLE(@TITLEGUID) = 1 and dbo.USR_UFN_ISRELIGIOUSTITLE(@SPOUSETITLEGUID) = 0 SET @spousefirst = 0
if dbo.USR_UFN_ISRELIGIOUSTITLE(@TITLEGUID) = 0 and dbo.USR_UFN_ISRELIGIOUSTITLE(@SPOUSETITLEGUID) = 1 SET @spousefirst = 1
end if @spousefirst is null AND (@usealphabetical <> 0 OR @usealphabetical is null) set @usealphabetical = 1;
if @usealphabetical = 1 AND @spousefirst is null begin
if LOWER(@LASTNAME) = LOWER(@SPOUSELASTNAME) begin if LOWER(@FIRSTNAME) = LOWER(dbo.USR_UFN_SORTNAME(@FIRSTNAME, @SPOUSEFIRSTNAME, 0)) set @spousefirst = 0 else set @spousefirst = 1
end else begin if LOWER(@LASTNAME) = LOWER(dbo.USR_UFN_SORTNAME(@LASTNAME, @SPOUSELASTNAME, 0)) set @spousefirst = 0 else set @spousefirst = 1 end
end
if @usealphabetical = 1 AND @spousefirst is null begin if LOWER(@LASTNAME) = LOWER(@SPOUSELASTNAME) begin if LOWER(@FIRSTNAME) = LOWER(dbo.USR_UFN_SORTNAME(@FIRSTNAME, @SPOUSEFIRSTNAME, 0)) set @spousefirst = 0 else set @spousefirst = 1
end else begin if LOWER(@LASTNAME) = LOWER(dbo.USR_UFN_SORTNAME(@LASTNAME, @SPOUSELASTNAME, 0)) set @spousefirst = 0 else set @spousefirst = 1 end end -- End of picking if the spouse is first.
-- This portion handles mr. and mrs. samelastname if (@title = 'Mr.' OR @TITLE = 'Dr.') AND @spousetitle = 'Mrs.' AND @difflastnames = 0 AND @usespousesuff = 0 begin SET @result = @title + N' and ' + @spousetitle + N' ' if len(@firstname) > 0 SET @result = @result + @firstname + N' ' --if len(@middlename) > 0 and len(@firstname) > 0 --SET @result = @result + dbo.UFN_MAKEINITIALS(@MIDDLENAME) + N' ' SET @result = @result + @lastname; if @usesuff = 1 begin if left(@SUFFIX, 1) <> ',' AND @SUFFIX <> 'I' AND @SUFFIX <> 'II' AND @SUFFIX <> 'III' AND @SUFFIX <> 'IV' AND @SUFFIX <> 'V' set @result = @result + N', ' if @SUFFIX = 'I' OR @SUFFIX = 'II' OR @SUFFIX = 'III' OR @SUFFIX = 'IV' OR @SUFFIX = 'V' set @result = @result + N' ' set @result = @result + @SUFFIX; end
set @result = replace(@result, ' ', ' ');
return @result; end if @title = 'Mrs.' AND (@spousetitle = 'Mr.' OR @SPOUSETITLE = 'Dr.') AND @difflastnames = 0 AND @usesuff = 0 begin SET @result = @spousetitle + N' and ' + @title + N' ' if len(@spousefirstname) > 0 SET @result = @result + @spousefirstname + N' ' --if len(@spousemiddlename) > 0 and len(@spousefirstname) > 0 --SET @result = @result + dbo.UFN_MAKEINITIALS(@SPOUSEMIDDLENAME) + N' ' SET @result = @result + @spouselastname if @usespousesuff = 1 begin if left(@SPOUSESUFFIX, 1) <> ',' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'I' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'II' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'III' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'IV' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'V' set @result = @result + N', ' if @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'I' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'II' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'III' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'IV' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'V' set @result = @result + N' ' set @result = @result + @SPOUSESUFFIX; end set @result = replace(@result, ' ', ' '); return @result; end -- End Mr and Mrs. SameLastName
if @spousefirst = 0 begin if @usetitles = 1 SET @result = @TITLE + N' ' if @usefirstnames = 1 SET @result = @result + @FIRSTNAME + N' ' --if @usemiddle = 1 --SET @result = @result + dbo.UFN_MAKEINITIALS(@MIDDLENAME) + N' ' if @difflastnames = 1 OR @usesuff = 1 OR @title = 'Ms.' OR @spousetitle = 'Ms.' OR (@spechandle = 1 and @usefirstnames = 1) begin SET @result = @result + @LASTNAME if @usesuff = 1 begin if left(@SUFFIX, 1) <> ',' AND @SUFFIX <> 'I' AND @SUFFIX <> 'II' AND @SUFFIX <> 'III' AND @SUFFIX <> 'IV' AND @SUFFIX <> 'V' set @result = @result + N', ' if @SUFFIX = 'I' OR @SUFFIX = 'II' OR @SUFFIX = 'III' OR @SUFFIX = 'IV' OR @SUFFIX = 'V' set @result = @result + N' ' set @result = @result + @SUFFIX; end end
SET @RESULT = @result + N' and '
if @usetitles = 1 SET @result = @result + @SPOUSETITLE + N' ' if @usefirstnames = 1 SET @result = @result + @SPOUSEFIRSTNAME + N' ' --if @usemiddle = 1 --SET @result = @result + dbo.UFN_MAKEINITIALS(@SPOUSEMIDDLENAME) + N' ' SET @result = @result + @SPOUSELASTNAME if @usespousesuff = 1 begin if left(@SPOUSESUFFIX, 1) <> ',' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'I' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'II' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'III' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'IV' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'V' set @result = @result + N', ' if @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'I' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'II' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'III' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'IV' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'V' set @result = @result + N' ' set @result = @result + @SPOUSESUFFIX; end
set @result = replace(@result, ' ', ' '); return @result; end
if @spousefirst = 1 begin if @usetitles = 1 SET @result = @SPOUSETITLE + N' ' if @usefirstnames = 1 SET @result = @result + @SPOUSEFIRSTNAME + N' ' --if @usemiddle = 1 --SET @result = @result + dbo.UFN_MAKEINITIALS(@SPOUSEMIDDLENAME) + N' ' if @difflastnames = 1 OR @usespousesuff = 1 OR @spousetitle = 'Ms.' OR @title = 'Ms.' OR (@spousespechandle = 1 and @usefirstnames = 1) begin SET @result = @result + @SPOUSELASTNAME if @usespousesuff = 1 begin if left(@SPOUSESUFFIX, 1) <> ',' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'I' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'II' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'III' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'IV' AND @SPOUSESUFFIX <> 'V' set @result = @result + N', ' if @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'I' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'II' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'III' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'IV' OR @SPOUSESUFFIX = 'V' set @result = @result + N' ' set @result = @result + @SPOUSESUFFIX; end end SET @RESULT = @result + N' and '
if @usetitles = 1 SET @result = @result + @TITLE + N' ' if @usefirstnames = 1 SET @result = @result + @FIRSTNAME + N' ' --if @usemiddle = 1 --SET @result = @result + dbo.UFN_MAKEINITIALS(@MIDDLENAME) + N' ' SET @result = @result + @LASTNAME if @usesuff = 1 begin if left(@SUFFIX, 1) <> ',' AND @SUFFIX <> 'I' AND @SUFFIX <> 'II' AND @SUFFIX <> 'III' AND @SUFFIX <> 'IV' AND @SUFFIX <> 'V' set @result = @result + N', ' if @SUFFIX = 'I' OR @SUFFIX = 'II' OR @SUFFIX = 'III' OR @SUFFIX = 'IV' OR @SUFFIX = 'V' set @result = @result + N' ' set @result = @result + @SUFFIX; end
set @result = replace(@result, ' ', ' '); return @result; end
end
return @RESULT; end
